title_sort: peter eckler to walt whitman, 22 april 1865
title: Peter Eckler to Walt Whitman, 22 April 1865
text: New YorkApril 22, 1865 W. Whitman sirOn page 31 verse 2 line 3 of Drum Taps the word "recalls" is spelled "recals." According to Webster & Worcester it is wrong but before taking the responsibility of altering it, I wait for your decision. Please let me know as soon as possible. The other corrections and alterations I enclose a proof of 'O Pioneers!'" & I think is improved I enclose a bill showing the balanceount. If I receive printing done by Saturday, you can transmit me the cost and I will deliver the texts to your binder.Your Respectfully,P. EcklerTo cover stereotyping &$114.60Two taking extra paperwork2.00Cover & stereotyping & pages3.00Alteration of plates1.00One box for plates1.003 Reams paper63.007 " 8.25 $192.85Cr[edit] by cash138.00 54.85Sent $20 April 26 $20 May 2 leaving (May 2 '65.) $14.85 due Mr. Eckler's Bill Apil 22 '65 Peter Eckler to Walt Whitman, 22 April 1865
